EmailTemplate.name: Event - Partner Day 2015.Email - invite 2 (EN)
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now! Tricentis Partner Day - Oct. 21st, 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<!-- -->
Novomatic Forum Vienna, Austria October 21st, 2015 2:00 pm - 6:00 pm CEST Followed by dinner & networking
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/partner-day-reg?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We would like to invite you to our Partner Day 2015 <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/partner-day-reg?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>, an exciting part of Tricentis Accelerate designed exclusively for you – our partners! The event will feature technical updates and news regarding the partner program, as well as an open platform for discussion and networking.
Agenda:
2:00 – 2:30 pm
Welcome Franz Fuchsberger, CSO
2:30 – 3:15 pm
Partner Program Update Alan Ota, Strategic Alliances
3:15 – 4:15 pm
Tosca 9.0 Preview & Demo Gerd Weishaar, VP Product Mgmt Roman Zednik,Director Presales
4:15 – 4:45 pm
Coffee Break
4:45 – 5:45 pm
Product Roadmap Gerd Weishaar, VP Product Mgmt
At the end of our Partner Day program you will have the chance to set up your booth for Accelerate 2015. We are happy to welcome you to our Partner & Speaker Dinner, which starts at 6:30 pm.
Location: Novomatic Forum <http://www.novomaticforum.com> Friedrichstraße 7 1010 Wien, Austria
We look forward to meeting you in Vienna.
Best regards,
The Tricentis Events Team
